description: Working on backend development for an enterprise insurance platform using Spring Boot in a high-scale banking environment.
Analyzing, understanding, and integrating existing Proposition Engine logic into new insurance journeys for different products.
Decoding and adapting Journey Engine configurations to ensure accurate policy flows and seamless customer experiences.
Collaborating with the Build/DevOps team to support CI/CD processes and ensure smooth deployment across environments.
Working with PostgreSQL and MongoDB for data handling, testing, and environment validation.
Rebuilt a scalable frontend architecture using React.js by refactoring legacy code and removing outdated, duplicate, and inconsistent UI components.
Unified multiple redundant dropdown and form components into clean reusable patterns, improving maintainability and cutting component duplication.
Enhanced application stability and user experience by modernizing old code and standardizing UI behaviour.
Authored detailed technical documentation, including component guidelines and integration notes for future developers.
Wrote complete release notes and changelogs covering new features, improvements, bug fixes, and technical upgrades.
Led the frontend development for a full-stack TPO web platform, collaborating with a 5-member team to deliver the product for a target client.
Designed and implemented the frontend architecture in React.js while ensuring seamless integration with backend APIs.
Coordinated closely with backend developers to align API contracts, resolve integration blockers, and maintain consistent data flow across the application.
Documented system architecture, user flows, and frontend workflows to support development continuity and reduce onboarding friction.
Improved developer efficiency by organizing reusable UI components and streamlining the component structure.
Helped reduce dev support load by 25% by providing clear troubleshooting guides and structured documentation.
Worked alongside a senior developer to build a production-ready doctors' medical application using Flutter.
Integrated Firebase services and implemented Redux-style state management to streamline data flow and optimize app responsiveness.
Improved app loading performance by 40%, enhancing user experience and overall stability.
Delivered rapid UI and feature updates based on stakeholder requirements, adapting quickly to evolving product needs in a fast-paced startup environment.
Ensured all implementations aligned with coding standards and relevant compliance guidelines to maintain a safe and reliable application experience.
Worked on a Machine Learning project to build a content-based Movie Recommendation System using Python and Jupyter Notebook.
Learned and implemented core ML concepts such as feature extraction, cosine similarity, and vectorization to generate accurate recommendations.
Engineered a scalable ML pipeline that improved the relevance and personalization of the recommendation results.
Created detailed project documentation including design diagrams, data flow representations, and architectural blueprints.
Integrated user-feedback iterations into the model workflow to refine recommendation accuracy and enhance the end-user experience.
